title: About Miami
abstract: Discover the history and culture that shaped Miami into the vibrant, diverse city it is today. From its early days as a small coastal town to its rise as an international metropolis, Miami's story is as rich as its culture.

services.title: Early History
services.intro: Learn about the early settlers and indigenous people who first called Miami home.
list: Tequesta Tribe: The first known inhabitants of the Miami area.
Ponce de León: Spanish explorer who first claimed Florida for Spain in the 16th century.
Julia Tuttle: The woman credited as the 'Mother of Miami,' who convinced Henry Flagler to extend the railroad here.

services.title: Miami’s Growth
services.intro: Explore how Miami transformed from a small town into a bustling city in the 20th century.
list: Land Boom of the 1920s: Rapid real estate development that shaped modern Miami.
Great Hurricane of 1926: A major disaster that temporarily slowed the city’s growth.
World War II: The role Miami played as a military training base and how it helped the city's economy.

services.title: Cultural Diversity
services.intro: Miami’s diverse population and influence from Latin America and the Caribbean have shaped its unique culture.
list: Cuban Influence: How the influx of Cuban immigrants in the 1960s reshaped Miami.
Haitian and Caribbean Communities: Other significant immigrant populations contributing to the city’s diversity.
Latin American Cultural Center: Miami as a hub for Latin American arts, business, and culture.

services.title: Modern Miami
services.intro: From a travel destination to a global city, Miami continues to grow and evolve.
list: Art Basel: Miami's rise as an international center for contemporary art.
Tech Hub: The growth of Miami as a hotspot for startups and technology companies.
Downtown Revitalization: The ongoing transformation of Miami's urban core.

packages.title: Historical Walking Tour
packages.description: Take a guided tour through Miami's historic neighborhoods and learn about the city's fascinating past.

packages.title: Cuban Culture Tour
packages.description: Immerse yourself in the Cuban culture that defines much of Miami, with stops in Little Havana for food, music, and history.

packages.title: Art Deco District Tour
packages.description: Explore Miami Beach's famous Art Deco architecture with a knowledgeable guide.

packages.title: Museum Pass
packages.description: Gain access to multiple Miami museums, including the Perez Art Museum and the HistoryMiami Museum.

packages.title: Downtown Miami Skyline Cruise
packages.description: Enjoy stunning views of downtown Miami from Biscayne Bay with a guided cruise.

packages.title: Miami Architecture Tour
packages.description: Discover Miami's iconic buildings and modern architecture with a private guided tour.
